bio: Calabria Technology is a California based technology consulting and IT Professional Services Company. We design, develop and manage enterprise and mobile applications, websites, web services and emerging technology solutions with a core focus on project management, technical expertise and integration of information technology. We are dedicated to providing the best value, technology, and solution for your technology requirements. Since our inception, Calabria Technology has developed a solid reputation as a valued, quality-driven technology partner servicing organizations worldwide. We pride ourselves in providing end-to-end, industry-specific technology solutions tuned precisely to meet the needs of today's complex, secure, and transaction-driven requirements.

user.name: Consumer Product Business Dev.
metadata: New York, New York, United States

abstrac: Consumer Product Biz-Dev Expert: Proven VP Sales, Product Strategy, North America | Helping Companies Translate Their Business Goals to Reality
bio:
Omni-channel, Consumer Product: 
• Brand and Business Development
• Product Strategy
Helping Companies Translate Their Business Goals to Reality
•  Broadened account base and market channels
•  Expanded shelf-space, brand presence and loyalty
•  New and sustained key account relationships
•  Tightened sales process and improved closing ratios
•  Increased average order and rate of sale
•  Market timed product introductions and high-impact line extensions
•  Best practices and continuous improvement in sales and operations
•  Growth of commitment and loyalty from reps and accounts
•  Strategic trade show planning and effective trade marketing
•  Increased profit and brand equity
•  Better decision making, faster growth, fewer mistakes

Barney started his career with Hyatt Hotels rising to the level of Food and Beverage Director. The next phase of his career, in retail and wholesale, began with the positions of Sales Manager and Buyer with Macy's Corporation, subsequently operating a successful independent sales agency, and as Director and VP of Sales with two consumer product companies. Barney is involved in spearheading complete business operations - sales & product management with accountability for profitability; forecasting targets and executing them. He is a quick learner with strong management skills and laser-like ability to analyze issues and drive improvement to increase efficiency in operation and decreases in expenses with minimal resources. He's enthusiastic, self-motivated and hands-on leader with experience in all aspects of management, operations planning and seamless execution with exceptional analytical skills and natural ability to organize complex details into actionable plans.

Barney is skilled at defining priorities, determining brand and resource investment. Product & Channel expertise in brand building, merchandising and trade communication, Barney understands the big-picture of an organization and works effectively with all.

bio: There are several elements that go into making a website graceful. And the right web designing professional knows exactly the elements that are to be used for the same. I have been working as a web designing professional and I can proudly say that my clients are satisfied with what I deliver. I do entertain their ideas and views as the website after all is being made for them. In this regard, I would say that the right dosage of visual arts, typography, images, content in other words is what matters most and makes a website graceful. As far as Content Management System is concerned, I prefer to work with Joomla, Magento, and Wordpress. I also incorporate WordPress themes and templates. You can trust my work as all my pages are W3C Validated. I am also comfortable working with XHTML and FBML. Other areas where I specialize include developing walls for Facebook, Twitter, and You Tube. I have also developed apps for Facebook.

Hours of Operation:- I typically work for 40hours / week depending upon the size of the project.

Pricing Model:- Fixed price basis or Time & Material basis

Preferred Communication:-My communication with the clients takes place through Skype chats/call, WhatsApp,TeamViewer, Email etc
I normally follow the following protocol for Wordpress Development :
Step 1 : Create the Graphical Layout in Photoshop and send the Mock ( JPG ) for approval.
Step 2: Once the Mock is approved, The PSD to HTML Conversion is done and the URL of the HTML page is send for approval.
Step 3: Once the HTML is approved , HTML to Wordpress Theme conversion Takes place.
Step 4: The Theme will be installed on our development server and URL of the wordpress site is send for the approval of the theme.
Step 5 : Once the theme is approved , Internal pages are created and other functionalities are implemented.

abstrac: Web designing essentials for a graceful website
bio: Web designing is a profession that does not require you to be a rocket scientist but what you need are presence of mind, aesthetic sense, innovative bent of mind, graceful approach, and at the same time a commercial bent of mind too. Commercial because you know at the end of the day you are out there to do business. I have been working as a web designing professional and I believe in mixing a personal touch with a certain degree of commercialism so that the website sells well for my clients. I have worked with different web designing tools, options, and features, the most prominent ones being XHTML, FBML, Strict and Transitional DOCTYPES, typography, visual arts, accurate and suitable page layouts. I am also into developing walls for Facebook, Twitter, and You Tube, and creating Facebook apps. WordPress, Joomla, and Magento are the Content Management Systems that I prefer to work with.

I normally follow the following protocol for Wordpress Development :

Step 1 : Create the Graphical Layout in Photoshop and send the Mock ( JPG ) for approval.

Step 2: Once the Mock is approved, The PSD to HTML Conversion is done and the URL of the HTML page is send for approval.

Step 3: Once the HTML is approved , HTML to Wordpress Theme conversion Takes place.

Step 4: The Theme will be installed on our development server and URL of the wordpress site is send for the approval of the theme.

Step 5 : Once the theme is approved , Internal pages are created and other functionalities are implemented.

abstrac: Promote your online business with a graceful website
bio: Website is a window to your shop and when it comes to shopping online, you have to use the right set of tools to promote your business. As a matter of fact, I can develop the website for you as I have done for innumerable others. My experience and years of hands on training has graced the websites of many clients. I firmly believe in visual representation of your products and for this I usually make use of the best elements available for making a website graceful and appealing. As far as Content Management System is concerned, I prefer working with Joomla, Magento, and WordPress. WordPress themes and templates are also options I have worked with. Aside from the above, you can hire me for tasks related to FBML, XHTML, developing Facebook apps, walls of Twitter and Facebook and also You Tube. I also work with Strict and Transitional DOCTYPES and typography, page layout, and visual art is also tools I use for making a website graceful.

I normally follow the following protocol for Wordpress Development :

Step 1 : Create the Graphical Layout in Photoshop and send the Mock ( JPG ) for approval.

Step 2: Once the Mock is approved, The PSD to HTML Conversion is done and the URL of the HTML page is send for approval.

Step 3: Once the HTML is approved , HTML to Wordpress Theme conversion Takes place.

Step 4: The Theme will be installed on our development server and URL of the wordpress site is send for the approval of the theme.

Step 5 : Once the theme is approved , Internal pages are created and other functionalities are implemented.

commnet: Great Job. I really like the way his images turn out

bio:
Professional cartoonist/caricaturist in portuguese sports newspaper "A Bola" since 1992.
Also working as a freelancer, with several books illustrared, as campaigns, character design, etc.
In these 20 years of experience I've developed a special taste for large scale projects, like creating 400 caricatures for a special magazine dedicated to the football World Cup 2010 and others of this nature.

Usually a color caricature of a person takes me around 4-5 hours to complete after client approval of previous pencil sketch. A black & white, pencil lines caricature takes me around 1 hour to complete. The price depends on the level of detail but a color caricature may cost around 80-150 USD.

commnet: Great job, I would easily use Janine again.

abstrac: Young Fulltime RN, Wife, Mother of 2
bio:
I feel a highlight of myself would be my education as an RN. I am also certified in my area of expertise (high risk labor and delivery).I am in management so I have leadership skills as well.A little personal side note is that I was a 19 year old single mom. I am now 28 and married, but have traveled quite a journey to get to where I am now.

I am a RN in labor and delivery who on the side loves to write! I became passionate about it back in high school and now have started a side business of freelance writing. I have written about all sorts of topics and I love to research!

Motivated freelance writer, Janine, is offering exceptional writing and copyediting skills, as well as in-depth knowledge of pregnancy, childbirth, nursing, breastfeeding, childcare, babies, toddlers, school age kids, marriage and relationship advice, lifestyle, finance advice, pets, fitness, health, wellness, cooking, budget tips, and saving money. Janine is an accurate, assertive and adaptable freelancer who can effectively multi-task in challenging situations and meet critical deadlines. She is also a hard-working, experienced freelancer focused on content writing. Dedicated to delivering the highest quality service to every client. Reliable and conscientious. If you need something written for your blog, website, or even product descriptions or reviews, I can help you. I also love to research things I am unfamiliar with, so whatever topic you have, I can work with. Beyond that I am a registered nurse, and have been for eight years. I have a lot of experience with teaching as well.
